data.text:
The largest and most prestigious folk art festival in the Carpathian Basin, the Crafts Festival, will be held in the Buda Castle for the 36th time. The focus of the event will now be on crafts related to woodwork, which visitors can learn about through demonstrations and visual workshops. The organizers are preparing a diverse program, including craft and theater programs, a playhouse, concerts, fashion shows and stunt performers.

• This year the event will also be located in the civic part of Buda Castle: Árpád Tóth promenade, Táncsics Mihály and Tárnok street , Szentáromság square and Dísz square

• The event is free

• Guest of honor: South Korea ??

• Crafts related to woodwork are the main theme of the festival

• Nearly a thousand master craftsmen
